name: MIDI Triggers
description: This algorithm generates gates and triggers from MIDI or I2C note messages.

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.description: Sets whether to generate a trigger from note on messages, or a gate from note on/off messages.

parameters.name: Velocity
parameters.description: Sets whether to apply velocity scaling to the trigger/gate magnitude.

parameters.name: Min level
parameters.description: If applying velocity scaling, the voltage corresponding to minimum velocity.

parameters.name: Note number
parameters.description: The note number to respond to, or ‘Any'
